Apr  4 04:54:51 dbdf31 postgres[20373]: [49-2]  ("pg_attrdef"."adnum" = "pg_attribute"."attnum")) LEFT OUTER JOIN "pg_index" ON (("pg_index"."indrelid" = "pg_class"."oid") AND ("pg_index"."indisprimary" IS TRUE)) WHERE (("pg_attribute"."attisdropped" IS FALSE) AND ("pg_attribute"."attnum" > 0) AND ("pg_class"."relname" = 'guns_n_roses_in_chicago') AND ("pg_namespace"."nspname" = 'public')) ORDER BY "pg_attribute"."attnum"
